China opposes US sanctions on Chinese companies for Russia-related reasonsChina firmly opposes the United States imposing sanctions on Chinese enterprises for Russia-related reasons, the Chinese commerce ministry said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 07:52:51 GMT YYP3MKZIWJJHDA55HJLGK6366M https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-opposes-us-sanctions-chinese-companies-Russia-lated-reasons-2024-02-26/Reuters世界中国
Exclusive: Satellite images reveal floating barrier at mouth of disputed atoll in South China SeaSatellite images of the hotly disputed Scarborough Shoal in the South China Sea show a new floating barrier across its entrance, near where Philippine ships and China coast guard vessels have had frequent run-ins. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 07:42:04 GMT ZN2XEXDFRZM7BLA65BNKFX7GY4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/satellite-images-reveal-floating-barrier-mouth-disputed-atoll-south-china-sea-2024-02-26/Greg Torode, Karen Lema世界亚太地区
US Coast Guard boards Chinese fishing boats near Kiribati, official saysThe U.S. Coast Guard and Kiribati police boarded two Chinese fishing boats during a patrol against illegal fishing in the Pacific Islands nation's vast exclusive economic zone this month but found no issues aboard, a coast guard official said. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 06:34:27 GMT KPXLSSVCRBLX7OBPEP665FZQ2E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-coast-guard-boards-chinese-fishing-boats-near-kiribati-official-says-2024-02-26/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Russia finance minister says in talks with China on yuan loansRussia's finance ministry has been discussing with its Chinese counterparts the possibility of taking out loans in yuan, but there has been no decision yet, Russian Finance Minister Anton Siluanov told state media in remarks published on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 04:02:48 GMT OAGKBJCLANJJTIWTUEXA2Y2VWM https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/ Russia-finance-minister-says-talks-with-china-yuan-loans-2024-02-26/Reuters市场货币
Ant Group outbids Citadel for Credit Suisse's China unit, Bloomberg reportsFintech giant Ant Group has outbid billionaire Ken Griffin's Citadel Securities for Credit Suisse's investment bank venture in China, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday, adding it was unclear whether the Chinese company's offer would succeed. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 01:55:51 GMT TQYQJQOQBNIBNDNUYAN3K6YFUA https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/ant-outbids-citadel-securities-credit-suisses-china-unit-bloomberg-reports-2024-02-26/Reuters商业金融
China seeks to strengthen cooperation with New Zealand for CPTPP, commerce minister saysChina is willing to work with New Zealand to continue strengthening cooperation in the process of joining The Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, its commerce minister said. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 23:40:59 GMT DGNSCQ3FBJPAXO3BTCAMGFB6PM https://www.reuters.com/world/china-seeks-strengthen-cooperation-with-new-zealand-cptpp-commerce-minister-says-2024-02-25/Reuters世界
China says it has conducted patrols in waters near KinmenChina's Fujian coast guard conducted patrols in waters near Kinmen on Feb. 25, China Coast Guard said. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 08:10:58 GMT ZPY4ATBFDZKF7AN2QXOMSQ7OTA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-it-has-conducted-patrols-waters-near-kinmen-2024-02-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
PREVIEW Facing Chinese EV rivals, Europe's automakers squeeze suppliers on costsEurope's automakers and their already-stretched suppliers face a tough year as they race to cut costs for electric models to counter leaner Chinese rivals which are bringing cheaper vehicles to challenge them on their home turf. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 06:06:55 GMT VFFJE7R7UROAXCF5ZXOP2M6TDE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/faceing-chinese-ev-rivals-europes-automakers-squeeze-suppliers-costs-2024-02-25/Nick Carey商业汽车与交通
Australia sweep T20 series against NZ in rain-affected clashAustralia completed a clean sweep of their three-match Twenty20 series against New Zealand on Sunday as Matthew Wade's side won a rain-affected clash by 27 runs via the Duckworth-Lewis method at Eden Park. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 04:48:34 GMT 75UUIJNL7NIU7ADDUBXAX托威https://www.reuters.com/sports/cricket/australia-sweep-t20-series-against-nz-rain-affected-clash-2024-02-25/Reuters运动的蟋蟀
Switzerland doubtful Russia will join start of Ukraine peace summitRussia is unlikely to take part at the outset of a high-level Ukraine peace conference which neutral Switzerland plans to host in the coming months, Swiss President Viola Amherd was quoted as saying by a newspaper on Saturday. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 11:45:53 GMT Z3HNJVG2VJMNLHG7UJTTOLVJLU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/switzerland-doubtful- Russia-will-join-start-ukraine-peace-summit-2024-02-24/Reuters世界欧洲
Chinese turn to Ivankovic after Jankovic contract terminatedBranko Ivankovic has been named China's new head coach, replacing Aleksandar Jankovic after the Serbian failed to take the country beyond the group phase of last month's Asian Cup. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 07:40:50 GMT WIGOTFSQRFMUVHOZTTUTDZDDVU https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/chinese-turn-ivankovic-after-jankovic-contract-termminate-2024-02-24/Michael Church运动的足球
